Bibliographic References: PP, no. 50, pi. 11 b; PPSupp no. 61
Imagery Description: (a) Standing draped woman with bird, and two nude women at laver, l. feeding bird, r. with mirror; white female head above, (b) Woman with wreath and mirror, youth with stick and beadNon Sepcifiedwreath, beside a laver.
Additional Notes: Lid originally had two elements: (a) halfNon Sepcifieddraped woman with cista in r. hand, (b) siren; above: hound pursuing bird. Lid has since disappeared.
